data.title: Bachelor's programmes
data.text:
In the Celtic Languages and Culture programme, you immerse yourself in the Celtic languages (Old Irish and Middle Welsh) and cultures. Learn to distinguish the facts from the myths!

At this international Bachelor's programme you will learn how new drugs for diseases such as cancer, diabetes and Alzheimer’s can be discovered and developed.

Economics and Business Economics in Utrecht looks at societal issues in combination with geography, law and social sciences. A good start to your economic career.

In the English bachelor degree programme, we investigate language, literature and culture in the English-speaking world.

Global Sustainability Science is an interdisciplinary and international Bachelor’s programme. In this programme you learn how to develop solutions to sustainability issues. The programme will equip you to make a meaningful contribution to our planet!

With the Bachelor's programme History at Utrecht University, you dive into history to understand events in contemporary society.

In the Linguistics bachelor, you learn what language is all about and its technicalities. How is it possible that people understand each other?

In the Literary Studies programme, you take a close look at literature and the role it plays in society. You compare literature of all kinds of eras, from ancient to modern times.

The Media and Culture programme studies different types of media in a broad context and in relation to one another. You will learn about the history, theory and larger social context in which different media function.

This interdisciplinary and international Bachelor’s combines biology, chemistry, physics and the pharmaceutical sciences to study life from different perspectives.

In the PPE programme, you look at political and economic issues from four different perspectives: philosophy, politics, economics, and history.

UCR is a Liberal Arts and Sciences programme. At UCR, motivated and curious students create their own individual program on an international campus.
